work.summary: Full stack engineer on Engineering Intelligence Platform
highlights: Full-Stack engineer on React/Typescript/NoSQL microservice based stack
Developed static analysis rules for leading AppSec company to detect & mitigate code-based security vulnerabilities
Developed and deployed kubernetes IaC stack to variety of environments including AWS + bare-metal

work.company: University of Sydney - Faculty of Medicine + NSW Health
work.summary: Translating high-volume, routinely collected electronic medical records into high-value research data to improve patient outcomes
highlights: Built highly scalable data pipeline + contributed to FOSS pipelining software for documenting & monitoring pipeline
Designed + Built web-app for rapid labeling of datasets. Focus on UX, ergonomics, discoverability & rapid keyboard navigation.
[COMM1190](https://www.business.unsw.edu.au/degrees-courses/course-outlines/COMM1190): Data, Insights and Decisions

work.company: University of Sydney - School of Computer Science + Elec. Eng.
highlights: [COMP2017](https://www.sydney.edu.au/units/COMP2017): Systems Programming, in C within *NIX, concurrency, data structures, memory safety.
[COMP2123](https://www.sydney.edu.au/units/COMP2123): Data Structure + Algos.
[INFO1110](https://www.sydney.edu.au/units/INFO1110): Intro to programming, OOP, specification breakdown, testcase design
[ELEC3607](https://www.sydney.edu.au/units/ELEC3607): Embedded Systems in C++ - Registry manipulation of ARM Cortex M3, ASM, debugging embedded

volunteer.summary: Research project for improving outcomes for children with cancer.
highlights: Design + implement data-transformation/analysis programs using Python, R
Algorithmically distinguished occurrences of bacteraemia from false-positives in datasets with >94% accuracy.
Vital role in successful use-case demo for eMR data-warehouse migration

projects.name: matthewstrasiotto/mandrake
projects.summary: `R` package that connects `code` `</>` docs to `data` docs ðŸ“ˆ [demo](https://straz.to/mandrake/articles/mandrake.html#graph)
highlights: Extends standard docstring tools to accomodate structured documentation of fields of input & output data
Structured data doc can be serialized, & used in enriching directional acyclic graphs (DAGs) of pipeline

Information about a given target (eg, command used to generate, links to functions used, documentation on target properties) in a pipeline can be discovered by clicking on that target in the network graph.

projects.name: cronnit.com
projects.summary: Significant contributions to open source web-app for scheduling reddit posts (Now closed source)
highlights: Implement views for grouping posts according to content, as well as rapid templating workflows
Work across full Symfony + Redbeans (ORM) + SQL stack to enrich UX
[Link to my fork](https://github.com/matthewstrasiotto/cronnit.us)

awards.title: Engineers Australia First Year Student Award
